pages.text: Traveler's Backpacks adds portable storage that combines a chest, crafting table, and fluid tank into one handy pack. $(br2)Take everything you need on the go, and never run out of storage space again.

The backpack also features a built-in tool switcher. Press the $(k:travelersbackpack.cycle_tool)$() key and use the scroll wheel to change tools. This makes managing your tools easier and more efficient.

pages.title: Standard Backpack
pages.text: Start by crafting a Traveler's Backpack using leather, wool, and a chest. $(br2)Equip the backpack to access its storage, and use the crafting grid for on-the-go crafting.

pages.title: Iron Backpack
pages.text: For more storage, craft an Iron Backpack, which provides additional slots for your items.

pages.title: Magma Cube Backpack
pages.text: Magma Cube Backpack: Grants immunity to fire.

pages.title: Squid Backpack
pages.text: Squid Backpack: Provides night vision and water breathing.

pages.title: Creeper Backpack
pages.text: Creeper Backpack: When you're about to die, it causes an explosion, grants fire immunity, and restores health!
There are many more backpacks available. Look in $(l:mod_info/jei)JEI$() for more info and how to craft them. Some backpacks cannot be crafted and must be found in loot.
